website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful wooden spoons that are the perfect size to use as tableware. Despite some flaws common to wooden utensils, they are reasonably sturdy and useful.
pros: Crafted of natural nanmu wood that has a rich brown color
Plant-based lacquered finish is smooth and helps prevent food from sticking
Smaller size makes spoons perfect to use for eating soup and stirring coffee and tea
cons: Like most wooden spoons, they wear out over time
The downside of the smaller size is that they won't work well for cooking and serving

customer_reviews.title: Great but (read review)
customer_reviews.text: I’m suprised one broke since this wood is pretty solid It’s great though guess I might have been a little unluckly with one of the spoons that’s ok They also do tend to um chip? Chip I don’t know exactly what you would call it but they ‘chip’ over time
customer_reviews.author: Shiba Inu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you watch any Asian mukbangs on youtube, these are those same spoons that they use! Perfect big bite of rice and noodle soups! Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: MrsLee

customer_reviews.title: Love these spoons
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons . I do not only use them for soups but I also use them for stirring coffee in glass containers. Never have to hear the horrible clinking noise again.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: A.....MAZE-balls !
customer_reviews.text: I friggin love it !!! It’s the best thing I have bought on amazon I always had an issue when I bite metal spoons and it hurts my teeth, this was my problem solver! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: ... used it for the first time today and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time today and I love it!! Amazing quality. These spoons make me wanna drink soup all day. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: wlovec

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not sure if it’s durable
customer_reviews.text: The spoons look nice, but they are much lighter than I expected and somehow feel easy to break. The product description on Amazon mentioned Japanese but didn’t clarify the actual country of origin, and it is made in China. After used the spoons for few days, they are fine, not broken or scratched, still look nice. I used them for rice, the spoon is too shallow for soup to me. They still feel really lightweight when holding in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I use them all the time.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are amazing. They're so smooth I actually thought they were plastic and I'd ordered the wrong product. They're super easy to clean, and I don't feel like they absorb tastes and smells like other wooden spoons. They're just the right size to stir my 2 and 3 quart pans. i use them constantly, and have barely touched my other wooden spoons since I got them.
customer_reviews.author: EO in KC

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically nice!
customer_reviews.text: These wooden spoons look aesthetically nice! I haven’t used these for cooking and have used it once, eating an açaí. Easy to clean! Wash with mild soap, warm water, wipe clean and air dry before storing. Description says they are made from a Nanmu tree which are supposed to be durable softwood. However, these spoons are very “lightweight” which makes me wonder about it’s durability in the long run. But for the price, I am not too worried.
customer_reviews.author: Syde

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!! Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these spoons!!! In use them for meals. Coffee/tea, honey, cereal, soup, cooking and my 6 year old has been using them since he was tiny for yogurt. Broth etc. Very versatile and great for kids or elderly especially great for people with sensory issues so you/they don’t hear teeth against the spoon
customer_reviews.author: Sarah a.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We do living history events so needed some wooden cutlery pretty quick. These spoons are lovely and well made. Worked very well for our Nautical (Pirates but not pirates hehe) late 1700’s display!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive! Wonderfully beautiful wooden spoons that are perfect for soup or rice. The perfect item for Korean or Japanese meals.
customer_reviews.author: s.lewter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these spoons. They are very smooth and a nice size for stirring. They're a little big for eating but perhaps good for those who prefer to take bigger bites.
customer_reviews.author: The Halls

customer_reviews.title: I love these wooden spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these wooden spoons. The only reason I gave it a 4 is because after a while they wear out. But since they are wood, they won't last forever. Just take care of them by gently cleaning them. Dont leave them soaking in water. And once in a while, rub some olive oil on them. The oil will help restore the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Valasek

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: I use it for everything and put in dishwasher and still shiny

customer_reviews.title: Most durable , pretty and comfortable spoon!

It’s big but not hard to used. I started use it for everything including cooking. It’s the best material to cool down the food and does not transmit the heat as much. Long enough handle for everything. I love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Not for food that’s too hot
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and light, but I would not recommend using these for cooking. I put one into a pot of steamed rice to fluff and scoop out, and it seems to have melted off the top layer or so. That being said, these are very cute for eating, but I don’t think they will last very long.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Originally we bought these for Period food kits. They match wooden bowls, and trenchers. Gradually we moved them into the kitchen and use them all the time for Hot soups and Stews. They're perfect for getting a hot bite, without a hot utensil. They are easy to clean, and won't get ruined if they accidentally end up in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, very smooth, fun to eat with
customer_reviews.text: We searched high and low for wooden or bamboo spoons that could function as well as metal or plastic and we've found them. They are just large enough that you could even use them as mixing spoons in a pinch. Clean-up is easy if you do a quick rinse after use. I'm not sure I'll put these through the dishwasher though -- I like them too much. We've tried all of the spoons and they were all very smooth, no rough spots or odd variations. The finish is very smooth and no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated Normal Person

customer_reviews.title: Nice Spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to eat with so I wouldn't make that annoying metal scraping noise on bowls and plates as with metal spoons. Perfect for stews, rice bowls, and other hearty foods. Easy hand washing and doesn't seem to stain or keep smells. Don't scrub with the green scrub side of sponge, not needed and will probably rub off finish over time. Very light and sturdy spoons.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these spoons some time. I like the way they feel in my mouth and they are just the right size. customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I got these primarily to use as coffee stirrers in a French Press. My wife kept stealing my "stash" of wooden chopsticks. They are GREAT for this and the coating makes them easy to clean and prevents staining from the coffee. I've used the other four in the set as serving spoons for take-out items. They're the perfect size for that as well. Great product.

Work great, look beautiful and perfect for eating rice and mixing sauces. I hate using metal or plastic for dining as the wood feels better in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin S. Prusinski

customer_reviews.title: Love these,  Perfect for coffee

I keep them on the counter in a small glass, as a decoration as well. The are the perfect size for both me (small hands) and my fiance (extra large hands), fitting comfortably in both. I'm so excited to have found these!
customer_reviews.author: Jnoelle

product_meta.title: Spoons, Wooden Spoons for Eating Cooking, 6 Pieces Japanese Natural Plant Ellipse Wooden Ladle Spoon Set for Cooking Mixing Stirring Honey Tea Soda Dessert Coconut Bowl Nonstick Pots Kitchen
feature_bullets: ✔ 6 PIECES JAPANESE WOODEN SOUP SPOONS, salad spoon,cooking spoon,use as tea, coffee, dessert, sugar spoons, Simple and plain, natural color and elegant.

✔ WOOD APPETIZER SPOON SET is made of natural Nanmu wood, LENGTH: 8.78 our products are varnished with natural, eco-friendly, food-grade lacquer from lacquer tree, safe for kids and adults! Lacquer-varnishing prevents chopsticks from getting stained and going bad when in contact with food therefore they can be used for longer time.

✔ SOUP SPOONS DISHWASHER SAFE :Easy to clean and reusable,Great for hiking, mountain hiking, camping, lake fishing, construction site lunch or picnicking, perfect for nasi goreng, fried rice, curries soup,rice, cereal soup,Korean or Japanese meals.

✔ WOOD KITCHEN TOOLS are safe to use on cups, dishes and bowls, will not scratch surfaces. it may not frostbite or scald your hands,no matter how cold or hot the water is. Wooden tableware for home,for restaurant and hotel.
✔ EATING SPOONS SET safe for non-stick surfaces, safe, healthier, eco-friendly. it can't heated by microwave.
